problem_names:
lemma (in comm_monoid) factors_equal:
  "\<lbrakk>a=b; c=d\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> a\<otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub>c =  b\<otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub>d"

lemma (in comm_monoid) extend_prod:
  fixes a A S
  assumes fin: "finite S" and subset: "A\<subseteq>S" and a: "a\<in>A\<rightarrow>carrier G"
  shows "(\<Otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> x\<in>S. (if x\<in>A then a x else \<one>\<^bsub>G\<^esub>)) = (\<Otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> x\<in>A. a x)"
  (is "(\<Otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> x\<in>S. ?b x) = (\<Otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> x\<in>A. a x)")

lemma (in module) finsum_smult:
  "[| c\<in> carrier R; g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M |] ==>
   (c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A) = finsum M (%x. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x) A "

lemma (in module) finsum_smult_r:
  "[| v\<in> carrier M; f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R |] ==>
   (finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v) = finsum M (%x. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v) A "

lemma foldSet_not_depend:
  fixes A E 
  assumes h1: "D\<subseteq>E"
  shows "foldSetD D f e \<subseteq>foldSetD E f e"

lemma foldD_not_depend:
  fixes D E B f e A
  assumes h1: "LCD B D f" and h2: "LCD B E f" and h3: "D\<subseteq>E" and h4: "e\<in>D" and h5: "A\<subseteq>B" and h6: "finite B"
  shows "foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A"

lemma (in comm_monoid) finprod_all1[simp]:
  assumes all1:" \<And>a. a\<in>A\<Longrightarrow>f a = \<one>\<^bsub>G\<^esub>"
  shows "(\<Otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> a\<in>A. f a) = \<one>\<^bsub>G\<^esub>"
translations:
lemma (in comm_monoid) factors_equal:
  "\<lbrakk>a=b; c=d\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> a\<otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub>c =  b\<otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub>d"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>a = b; c = d\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> a \<otimes> c = b \<otimes> d
by simp

lemma (in comm_monoid) extend_prod:
  fixes a A S
  assumes fin: "finite S" and subset: "A\<subseteq>S" and a: "a\<in>A\<rightarrow>carrier G"
  shows "(\<Otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> x\<in>S. (if x\<in>A then a x else \<one>\<^bsub>G\<^esub>)) = (\<Otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> x\<in>A. a x)"
  (is "(\<Otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> x\<in>S. ?b x) = (\<Otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> x\<in>A. a x)")

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Otimes>x\<in>S. if x \<in> A then a x else \<one>) = finprod G a A
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Otimes>x\<in>S. if x \<in> A then a x else \<one>) = finprod G a A
from subset

proof (chain)
picking this:
  A \<subseteq> S
have uni:"S = A \<union> (S-A)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<subseteq> S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S = A \<union> (S - A)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  S = A \<union> (S - A)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Otimes>x\<in>S. if x \<in> A then a x else \<one>) = finprod G a A
from assms subset

proof (chain)
picking this:
  finite S
  A \<subseteq> S
  a \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier G
  A \<subseteq> S
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite S
  A \<subseteq> S
  a \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier G
  A \<subseteq> S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Otimes>x\<in>S. if x \<in> A then a x else \<one>) = finprod G a A
apply (subst uni)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>finite S; A \<subseteq> S; a \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier G;
     A \<subseteq> S\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (\<Otimes>x\<in>A \<union>
(S - A). if x \<in> A then a x else \<one>) =
                      finprod G a A
apply (subst finprod_Un_disjoint, auto)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>finite S; a \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier G;
     A \<subseteq> S\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> finite A
 2. \<lbrakk>finite S; a \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier G;
     A \<subseteq> S\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (\<Otimes>x\<in>A. if x \<in> A then a x
   else \<one>) \<otimes>
                      (\<Otimes>x\<in>S -
A. if x \<in> A then a x else \<one>) =
                      finprod G a A
by (auto cong: finprod_cong if_cong elim: finite_subset simp add:Pi_def finite_subset)

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Otimes>x\<in>S. if x \<in> A then a x else \<one>) = finprod G a A

goal:
No subgoals!
(*Pi_def is key for automation here*)

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Otimes>x\<in>S. if x \<in> A then a x else \<one>) = finprod G a A

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
text \<open>Scalar multiplication distributes over scalar multiplication (on left).\<close>
(*Add to module.*)

lemma (in module) finsum_smult:
  "[| c\<in> carrier R; g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M |] ==>
   (c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A) = finsum M (%x. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x) A "

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                   g x)
proof (induct A rule: infinite_finite_induct)

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A.
       \<lbrakk>infinite A; c \<in> carrier R;
        g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                      g x)
 2. \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> {} \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g {} =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>{}. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                    g x)
 3. \<And>x F.
       \<lbrakk>finite F; x \<notin> F;
        \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R;
         g \<in> F \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g F =
                          (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>F. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                       g x);
        c \<in> carrier R;
        g \<in> insert x F \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                         finsum M g (insert x F) =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert x
                    F. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x)
case (insert a A)

proof (state)
this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 g x)
  c \<in> carrier R
  g \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier M

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A.
       \<lbrakk>infinite A; c \<in> carrier R;
        g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                      g x)
 2. \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> {} \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g {} =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>{}. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                    g x)
 3. \<And>x F.
       \<lbrakk>finite F; x \<notin> F;
        \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R;
         g \<in> F \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g F =
                          (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>F. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                       g x);
        c \<in> carrier R;
        g \<in> insert x F \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                         finsum M g (insert x F) =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert x
                    F. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x)
from insert.hyps insert.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 g x)
  c \<in> carrier R
  g \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier M
have 1: "finsum M g (insert a A) = g a \<oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A"

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 g x)
  c \<in> carrier R
  g \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier M

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finsum M g (insert a A) = g a \<oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A
by (intro finsum_insert, auto)

proof (state)
this:
  finsum M g (insert a A) = g a \<oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A.
       \<lbrakk>infinite A; c \<in> carrier R;
        g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                      g x)
 2. \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> {} \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g {} =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>{}. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                    g x)
 3. \<And>x F.
       \<lbrakk>finite F; x \<notin> F;
        \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R;
         g \<in> F \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g F =
                          (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>F. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                       g x);
        c \<in> carrier R;
        g \<in> insert x F \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                         finsum M g (insert x F) =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert x
                    F. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x)
from insert.hyps insert.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 g x)
  c \<in> carrier R
  g \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier M

have 2: "(\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert a A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x) = c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g a \<oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>(\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 g x)
  c \<in> carrier R
  g \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier M

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert a
                                     A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x) =
    c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g a \<oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x)
by (intro finsum_insert, auto)

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert a
                                   A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x) =
  c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g a \<oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
  (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x)

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A.
       \<lbrakk>infinite A; c \<in> carrier R;
        g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                      g x)
 2. \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> {} \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g {} =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>{}. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                    g x)
 3. \<And>x F.
       \<lbrakk>finite F; x \<notin> F;
        \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R;
         g \<in> F \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g F =
                          (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>F. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                       g x);
        c \<in> carrier R;
        g \<in> insert x F \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                         finsum M g (insert x F) =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert x
                    F. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x)
from insert.hyps insert.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 g x)
  c \<in> carrier R
  g \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier M
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 g x)
  c \<in> carrier R
  g \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier M

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g (insert a A) =
    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert a
                                     A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x)
by (auto simp add:1 2 smult_r_distr)

proof (state)
this:
  c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g (insert a A) =
  (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert a
                                   A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> g x)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A.
       \<lbrakk>infinite A; c \<in> carrier R;
        g \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g A =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                      g x)
 2. \<lbrakk>c \<in> carrier R; g \<in> {} \<rightarrow> carrier M\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> finsum M g {} =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>{}. c \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                    g x)
qed auto
text \<open>Scalar multiplication distributes over scalar multiplication (on right).\<close>
(*Add to module.*)

lemma (in module) finsum_smult_r:
  "[| v\<in> carrier M; f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R |] ==>
   (finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v) = finsum M (%x. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v) A "

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                    x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                   v)
proof (induct A rule: infinite_finite_induct)

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A.
       \<lbrakk>infinite A; v \<in> carrier M;
        f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                       x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                      v)
 2. \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> {} \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f {} \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>{}. f
                     x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                    v)
 3. \<And>x F.
       \<lbrakk>finite F; x \<notin> F;
        \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M;
         f \<in> F \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f F \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                          (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>F. f
                        x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                       v);
        v \<in> carrier M;
        f \<in> insert x F \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f (insert x F) \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                         v =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert x
                    F. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v)
case (insert a A)

proof (state)
this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                  x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 v)
  v \<in> carrier M
  f \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier R

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A.
       \<lbrakk>infinite A; v \<in> carrier M;
        f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                       x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                      v)
 2. \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> {} \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f {} \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>{}. f
                     x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                    v)
 3. \<And>x F.
       \<lbrakk>finite F; x \<notin> F;
        \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M;
         f \<in> F \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f F \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                          (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>F. f
                        x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                       v);
        v \<in> carrier M;
        f \<in> insert x F \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f (insert x F) \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                         v =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert x
                    F. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v)
from insert.hyps insert.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                  x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 v)
  v \<in> carrier M
  f \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier R
have 1: "finsum R f (insert a A) = f a \<oplus>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> finsum R f A"

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                  x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 v)
  v \<in> carrier M
  f \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finsum R f (insert a A) = f a \<oplus> finsum R f A
by (intro R.finsum_insert, auto)

proof (state)
this:
  finsum R f (insert a A) = f a \<oplus> finsum R f A

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A.
       \<lbrakk>infinite A; v \<in> carrier M;
        f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                       x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                      v)
 2. \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> {} \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f {} \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>{}. f
                     x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                    v)
 3. \<And>x F.
       \<lbrakk>finite F; x \<notin> F;
        \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M;
         f \<in> F \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f F \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                          (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>F. f
                        x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                       v);
        v \<in> carrier M;
        f \<in> insert x F \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f (insert x F) \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                         v =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert x
                    F. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v)
from insert.hyps insert.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                  x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 v)
  v \<in> carrier M
  f \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier R

have 2: "(\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert a A. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v) = f a \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v \<oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>(\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                  x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 v)
  v \<in> carrier M
  f \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert a
                                     A. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v) =
    f a \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v \<oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v)
by (intro finsum_insert, auto)

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert a
                                   A. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v) =
  f a \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v \<oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
  (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v)

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A.
       \<lbrakk>infinite A; v \<in> carrier M;
        f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                       x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                      v)
 2. \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> {} \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f {} \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>{}. f
                     x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                    v)
 3. \<And>x F.
       \<lbrakk>finite F; x \<notin> F;
        \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M;
         f \<in> F \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f F \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                          (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>F. f
                        x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                       v);
        v \<in> carrier M;
        f \<in> insert x F \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f (insert x F) \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                         v =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert x
                    F. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v)
from insert.hyps insert.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                  x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 v)
  v \<in> carrier M
  f \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier R
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite A
  a \<notin> A
  \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                  x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                 v)
  v \<in> carrier M
  f \<in> insert a A \<rightarrow> carrier R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finsum R f (insert a A) \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
    (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert a
                                     A. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v)
by (auto simp add:1 2 smult_l_distr)

proof (state)
this:
  finsum R f (insert a A) \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
  (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>insert a
                                   A. f x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A.
       \<lbrakk>infinite A; v \<in> carrier M;
        f \<in> A \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f A \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                         (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>A. f
                       x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                      v)
 2. \<lbrakk>v \<in> carrier M; f \<in> {} \<rightarrow> carrier R\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> finsum R f {} \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub> v =
                      (\<Oplus>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>x\<in>{}. f
                     x \<odot>\<^bsub>M\<^esub>
                    v)
qed auto

text \<open>A sequence of lemmas that shows that the product does not depend on the ambient group. 
Note I had to dig back into the definitions of foldSet to show this.\<close>
(*Add the following 2 lemmas to Group.*)

lemma foldSet_not_depend:
  fixes A E 
  assumes h1: "D\<subseteq>E"
  shows "foldSetD D f e \<subseteq>foldSetD E f e"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldSetD D f e \<subseteq> foldSetD E f e
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldSetD D f e \<subseteq> foldSetD E f e
from h1

proof (chain)
picking this:
  D \<subseteq> E
have 1: "\<And>x1 x2. (x1,x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e \<Longrightarrow> (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD E f e"

proof (prove)
using this:
  D \<subseteq> E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x1 x2.
       (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e \<Longrightarrow>
       (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD E f e
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x1 x2.
       \<lbrakk>(x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e; D \<subseteq> E\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD E f e
fix x1 x2

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x1 x2.
       \<lbrakk>(x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e; D \<subseteq> E\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD E f e
assume 2: "(x1,x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e"

proof (state)
this:
  (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x1 x2.
       \<lbrakk>(x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e; D \<subseteq> E\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD E f e
from h1 2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  D \<subseteq> E
  (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e
show "?thesis x1 x2"

proof (prove)
using this:
  D \<subseteq> E
  (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD E f e

apply (intro foldSetD.induct[where ?D="D" and ?f="f" and ?e="e" and ?x1.0="x1" and ?x2.0="x2"
        and ?P = "\<lambda>x1 x2. ((x1, x2)\<in> foldSetD E f e)"])

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>D \<subseteq> E; (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e
 2. \<lbrakk>D \<subseteq> E; (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e;
     e \<in> D\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> ({}, e) \<in> foldSetD E f e
 3. \<And>x A y.
       \<lbrakk>D \<subseteq> E; (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e;
        x \<notin> A; f x y \<in> D; (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e;
        (A, y) \<in> foldSetD E f e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (insert x A, f x y) \<in> foldSetD E f e
apply auto
apply (intro emptyI, auto)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x A y.
       \<lbrakk>D \<subseteq> E; (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD D f e;
        x \<notin> A; f x y \<in> D; (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e;
        (A, y) \<in> foldSetD E f e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (insert x A, f x y) \<in> foldSetD E f e
by (intro insertI, auto)

proof (state)
this:
  (x1, x2) \<in> foldSetD E f e

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  (?x1.0, ?x2.0) \<in> foldSetD D f e \<Longrightarrow>
  (?x1.0, ?x2.0) \<in> foldSetD E f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldSetD D f e \<subseteq> foldSetD E f e
from 1

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (?x1.0, ?x2.0) \<in> foldSetD D f e \<Longrightarrow>
  (?x1.0, ?x2.0) \<in> foldSetD E f e
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  (?x1.0, ?x2.0) \<in> foldSetD D f e \<Longrightarrow>
  (?x1.0, ?x2.0) \<in> foldSetD E f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldSetD D f e \<subseteq> foldSetD E f e
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  foldSetD D f e \<subseteq> foldSetD E f e

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma foldD_not_depend:
  fixes D E B f e A
  assumes h1: "LCD B D f" and h2: "LCD B E f" and h3: "D\<subseteq>E" and h4: "e\<in>D" and h5: "A\<subseteq>B" and h6: "finite B"
  shows "foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  LCD B D f
  LCD B E f
  D \<subseteq> E
  e \<in> D
  A \<subseteq> B
  finite B
have 1: "\<exists>y. (A,y)\<in>foldSetD D f e"

proof (prove)
using this:
  LCD B D f
  LCD B E f
  D \<subseteq> E
  e \<in> D
  A \<subseteq> B
  finite B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y. (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e
apply (intro finite_imp_foldSetD, auto)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>LCD B D f; LCD B E f; D \<subseteq> E; e \<in> D;
     A \<subseteq> B; finite B\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> finite A
 2. \<And>y ya.
       \<lbrakk>y \<in> A; ya \<in> D; LCD B D f; LCD B E f;
        D \<subseteq> E; e \<in> D; A \<subseteq> B; finite B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> f y ya \<in> D
apply (metis finite_subset)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y ya.
       \<lbrakk>y \<in> A; ya \<in> D; LCD B D f; LCD B E f;
        D \<subseteq> E; e \<in> D; A \<subseteq> B; finite B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> f y ya \<in> D
by (unfold LCD_def, auto)

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>y. (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A
from 1

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<exists>y. (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e
obtain y where 2: "(A,y)\<in>foldSetD D f e"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>y. (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>y.
        (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A
from assms 2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  LCD B D f
  LCD B E f
  D \<subseteq> E
  e \<in> D
  A \<subseteq> B
  finite B
  (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e
have 3: "foldD D f e A = y"

proof (prove)
using this:
  LCD B D f
  LCD B E f
  D \<subseteq> E
  e \<in> D
  A \<subseteq> B
  finite B
  (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD D f e A = y
by (intro LCD.foldD_equality[of B], auto)

proof (state)
this:
  foldD D f e A = y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A
from h3

proof (chain)
picking this:
  D \<subseteq> E
have 4: "foldSetD D f e \<subseteq> foldSetD E f e"

proof (prove)
using this:
  D \<subseteq> E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldSetD D f e \<subseteq> foldSetD E f e
by (rule foldSet_not_depend)

proof (state)
this:
  foldSetD D f e \<subseteq> foldSetD E f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A
from 2 4

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e
  foldSetD D f e \<subseteq> foldSetD E f e
have 5: "(A,y)\<in>foldSetD E f e"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (A, y) \<in> foldSetD D f e
  foldSetD D f e \<subseteq> foldSetD E f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (A, y) \<in> foldSetD E f e
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (A, y) \<in> foldSetD E f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A
from assms 5

proof (chain)
picking this:
  LCD B D f
  LCD B E f
  D \<subseteq> E
  e \<in> D
  A \<subseteq> B
  finite B
  (A, y) \<in> foldSetD E f e
have 6: "foldD E f e A = y"

proof (prove)
using this:
  LCD B D f
  LCD B E f
  D \<subseteq> E
  e \<in> D
  A \<subseteq> B
  finite B
  (A, y) \<in> foldSetD E f e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD E f e A = y
by (intro LCD.foldD_equality[of B], auto)

proof (state)
this:
  foldD E f e A = y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A

proof (state)
this:
  foldD E f e A = y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A
from 3 6

proof (chain)
picking this:
  foldD D f e A = y
  foldD E f e A = y
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  foldD D f e A = y
  foldD E f e A = y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  foldD D f e A = foldD E f e A

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma (in comm_monoid) finprod_all1[simp]:
  assumes all1:" \<And>a. a\<in>A\<Longrightarrow>f a = \<one>\<^bsub>G\<^esub>"
  shows "(\<Otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> a\<in>A. f a) = \<one>\<^bsub>G\<^esub>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finprod G f A = \<one>
(*  "[| \<And>a. a\<in>A\<Longrightarrow>f a = \<one>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> |] ==> (\<Otimes>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> a\<in>A. f a) = \<one>\<^bsub>G\<^esub>" won't work with proof - *)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finprod G f A = \<one>
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finprod G f A = \<one>
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ?a \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> f ?a = \<one>
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?a \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> f ?a = \<one>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finprod G f A = \<one>
by (simp cong: finprod_cong)

proof (state)
this:
  finprod G f A = \<one>

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

context abelian_monoid
begin
lemmas summands_equal = add.factors_equal
lemmas extend_sum = add.extend_prod
lemmas finsum_all0 = add.finprod_all1
end
end
